articles.author: Andrew Dalton
articles.title: Ron Cephas Jones, 'This Is Us' actor, dies at 66 - Chicago Tribune
articles.description: Ron Cephas Jones, a veteran stage actor who won two Emmy Awards for his role as a long-lost father who finds redemption on the NBC television drama series “This Is Us,” has died at age 66, a representative said Saturday.
articles.content: LOS ANGELES — Ron Cephas Jones, a veteran stage actor who won two Emmy Awards for his role as a long-lost father who finds redemption on the NBC television drama series This Is Us, has died at age 66… [+3204 chars]
